程序包 miot.typedef.device

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    Action
    This class represents the Miot device's action.
    ActionDefinition  
    Argument
    This class represents the argument information of the Miot device's action.
    ArgumentDefinition  
    ConnectionParams
    This class represents the wifi device's connect information
    ConnectionParamsDefinition  
    Device
    This class represents the Miot Device, which include the device type DeviceType, exclusive logic ActionPermission, services Service and firmware information MiotFirmware
    DeviceDefinition  
    Event
    This class represents the Miot device's event information.
    EventDefinition  
    PrintLog  
    Service
    This class used to describe the Miot device ability.
    ServiceDefinition  
  • 枚举概要 
    枚举 说明
    Argument.Direction  
    ConnectionType
    This class represents the Miot device type according to the different physical link.
